title: VLC 3.0.20 Brings Fixes for Potential Security Issue, AV1 Hardware Decoder
description:
VLC 3.0.20 open-source and free media player is now available for download with various fixes for a couple of crashes, old AMD drivers, and a security issue.

The post VLC 3.0.20 Brings Fixes for Potential Security Issue, AV1 Hardware Decoder appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNU Linux-Libre 6.6 Kernel Released for Software Freedom Lovers
description:
GNU Linux-Libre 6.6 kernel is now available for download. This release is based on Linux kernel 6.6 and it’s targeted at those who seek 100% freedom for their personal computers.

The post GNU Linux-Libre 6.6 Kernel Released for Software Freedom Lovers appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Mozilla Doubles Down on Firefox DEB Package for Debian-Based Linux Distros
description:
Mozilla announces a dedicated APT repository for users of Debian, Ubuntu, Linux Mint, and derivatives who want to install Firefox as a DEB package.

The post Mozilla Doubles Down on Firefox DEB Package for Debian-Based Linux Distros appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Linux Kernel 6.6 Officially Released, This Is What’s New
description:
Linux kernel 6.6 is now available for download with Intel shadow-stack, new RISC-V features, new and updated drivers, support for more hardware devices, and much more.

The post Linux Kernel 6.6 Officially Released, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
